1: “Hey, dad! Can you play with me today?”
“Yay! What should we do first? Ooh, how about the train? Oh, and then, and then..!”
2: “Dad, can you read me a story?”
“I always wanted to know about the Milky Way! Let’s sit over there!”
3: “I'm hungry... I know! Let's make ravioli together!”
“Ravioli! Ravioli, ravioli, viola ra! I can't wait to mix the sauce!”
4: “Boo! Did I get you, dad? Hee hee! I’m over here!”
5: “I think you should go to work today. Don't worry about me, I'm fine on my own!"
“Dad, you've always worked so hard. ...I love you, dad.” *Cough*
6: "Sorry...  I know we were supposed to go to the park today..."
7: "I'm sorry to say... it's as if your daughter is spiraling into illness. Her conditions are dire."
"The medical bills total up to $5000.  Please spend time taking care of her."
10: "...Ever since I was little, you've worked so hard for us..."
11: "...It makes me happy that you're spending time with me now."
12: "...I heard what the doctor said, you know..."
13: "...It's okay, dad. I know it's a lot of money."
15: "...Is that why you spent so much time with me these few days?"
16: "...You've always wanted the best for me, didn't you?"
17: "I just want you to know that no matter what happens..."
18: "Whether it was spending time with me, or working for my benefit..."
19: "I know you always did your best as a parent, dad."
